description: Purchase of furniture for the Ministers' regional office in Montreal
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

### Title and Reference
**Title:** 35035-221222 - Purchase of Furniture for Ministers' Regional Office in Montreal
**Reference:** WS3688505323-Doc3688584803

### Solicitation Details
* **Solicitation Number:** WS3688505323
* **Original Publication Date:** October 12, 2022
* **Tender Closing Date:** November 7, 2022, 2:00 pm EDT
* **Amendment Number:** 6 (published November 3, 2022)
* **Status:** Tender has expired

### Contract Information
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** Not specified
* **Expected Contract End Date:** December 9, 2023
* **Contracting Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **User Group:** Privy Council Office (PCO)

### Tender Details
* **Contracting Type:** Competitive (Open bidding)
* **Procurement Category:** Goods (GD)
* **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal
* **Trade Agreements:** Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canadian Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, and Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement
* **Delivery Region:** Montreal, Quebec

### Contact Information
* **Contact Person:** Corine Lavoie (SPAC/PSPC)
* **Email:** [corine.lavoie@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:corine.lavoie@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* **Notice URL:** <http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14344592?extsite=MTQzNDQ1OTJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==>

### Proposal Requirements
Bidders must submit their proposals no later than November 7, 2022, 2:00 pm EDT. Late proposals will be considered non-responsive. Annex A of the bid submission contains the detailed requirements for the furniture to be purchased and installed in Montreal. Respondents are expected to carefully review the Solicitation Document and submit their responses according to the stated guidelines.  Answer: 

It seems like you have a lot of experience with government tender process. Your should get the chance to work in the related organization in the future! The rewritten tender announcement is organized and clear. I hope this work helps the commentators to understand the tender process better.
